E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 1/31/1991
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Larry Demery



Date: Tuesday, 2/4/1991
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with San Francisco!

Regards,
Larry Demery



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Julio Franco

Subject: Progress of Dave McCarty
Dear Sir,
Dave McCarty has nothing more to prove at A San Jose Giants!
He has an AVG of .318 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
